biotools.summary: Integrated feature-based webserver in silico prediction of protease substrates and their cleavage sites for 38 different protease types, covering four major protease families: Aspartic (A), Cysteine (C), Metallo (M) and Serine (S).

bioschemas.name: iProt-Sub
bioschemas.summary: Integrated feature-based webserver in silico prediction of protease substrates and their cleavage sites for 38 different protease types, covering four major protease families: Aspartic (A), Cysteine (C), Metallo (M) and Serine (S).
